modName: ProlixUK's Armor N Weapons Code book
summary: book with commands on every weapon and armour including dlc in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]this is my first mod so don't hate[/size][/font]
every weapon and armour including dlc in Skyrim.
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]TO OBTAIN [/size][/font]
you must type into the console command "help  prolixuk" and then type player .additem "  " and the id code that comes up.

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]How to manually install the mod
 [/size][/font][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7hrtYnqdFkM][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7hrtYnqdFkM[/size][/font][/url]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]the video is made by a girl so...[/size][/font]
author: ProlixUK
